refnamediv.refpurpose: Indicates whether the reader has reached the end of the input stream

refsection.para: This property tells the user if the reader has reached the end of the input.
Note that reading data from a T:JsonReader can be done in a loop checking the return value of the M:Read method, in which case it's not necessary to use this property.

example.title: Checking the EndOfJson property
